languages.text: "Твои подданные сделали из убийства развлечение. Сие есть великое святотатство, Домин'{name}. Не волнуйся — я объясню мирянам волю Неумирающего".
"Your subjects have turned the act of killing into amusement. This is a great sacrilege, Domin'{name}, but have no fear. I will explain the will of the Undying One to the laypeople."
languages.original_text: "Твои подданные сделали из убийства развлечение. Сие есть великое святотатство, Домин'{name}. Не волнуйся — я объясню мирянам волю Неумирающего".

"Your subjects have turned the act of killing into amusement. This is a great sacrilege, Domin'{name}, but have no fear. I will explain the will of the Undying One to the laypeople."

languages.text: «Sus súbditos han convertido el acto del asesinato en un entretenimiento. Es un gran sacrilegio, Domin'{name}, pero no tema. Explicaré la voluntad del Inmortal a los laicos».
languages.original_text: "Your subjects have turned the act of killing into amusement. This is a great sacrilege, Domin'{name}, but have no fear. I will explain the will of the Undying One to the laypeople."

traits.locale_text: «Sus súbditos han convertido el acto del asesinato en un entretenimiento. Es un gran sacrilegio, Domin'{name}, pero no tema. Explicaré la voluntad del Inmortal a los laicos».

languages.text: 「あなたの臣下は殺人行為を娯楽に変えてしまった。これは大いなる冒涜です、ドミン{name}。ですが、恐れることはないです。不死の者の意志を平民に説明します」
languages.original_text: "Your subjects have turned the act of killing into amusement. This is a great sacrilege, Domin'{name}, but have no fear. I will explain the will of the Undying One to the laypeople."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの臣下は殺人行為を娯楽に変えてしまった。これは大いなる冒涜です、ドミン{name}。ですが、恐れることはないです。不死の者の意志を平民に説明します」

languages.text: “你的臣民将杀戮变成了娱乐，这是极其严重的亵渎行为，秘者{name}。不过，无需惧怕，我会向那些教外人士解释不死之神的旨意。”
languages.original_text: "Your subjects have turned the act of killing into amusement. This is a great sacrilege, Domin'{name}, but have no fear. I will explain the will of the Undying One to the laypeople."

traits.locale_text: “你的臣民将杀戮变成了娱乐，这是极其严重的亵渎行为，秘者{name}。不过，无需惧怕，我会向那些教外人士解释不死之神的旨意。”

languages.text: "Eure Untertanen habt den Tötungsakt zu einem Vergnügen gemacht. Das ist ein großes Sakrileg, Domin'{name}, aber keine Angst. Ich werde den Laien den Willen des Todlosen erklären."
languages.original_text: "Your subjects have turned the act of killing into amusement. This is a great sacrilege, Domin'{name}, but have no fear. I will explain the will of the Undying One to the laypeople."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Untertanen habt den Tötungsakt zu einem Vergnügen gemacht. Das ist ein großes Sakrileg, Domin'{name}, aber keine Angst. Ich werde den Laien den Willen des Todlosen erklären."

languages.text: « Vos sujets ont fait de l'art de tuer une forme de divertissement. C'est un abominable sacrilège, Domin'{name}, mais rassurez-vous. Je me chargerai d'expliquer la volonté de l'Immortel à ces profanes. »
languages.original_text: "Your subjects have turned the act of killing into amusement. This is a great sacrilege, Domin'{name}, but have no fear. I will explain the will of the Undying One to the laypeople."

traits.locale_text: « Vos sujets ont fait de l'art de tuer une forme de divertissement. C'est un abominable sacrilège, Domin'{name}, mais rassurez-vous. Je me chargerai d'expliquer la volonté de l'Immortel à ces profanes. »

languages.text: "Tebaan, öldürme eylemini eğlenceye dönüştürüyor. Muazzam bir hürmetsizlik bu Domin'{name} ama korkun olmasın. Ölmeyen'in iradesini avama bizzat izah edeceğim."
languages.original_text: "Your subjects have turned the act of killing into amusement. This is a great sacrilege, Domin'{name}, but have no fear. I will explain the will of the Undying One to the laypeople."
